column4: I am in jaunty installed flashplugin-nonfree, and adobe-flashplugin, and adobe flash plugin 9 tried all three yet my flash videos still skip the sound plays fine just the videos skip any suggestions?
i got your answer, hang tight
squeak - http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/  download the .tar.gz for linux, then extract that to your desktop, and run the .sh file
but that installs the version 10 or 9 that still skips already did that
